result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

records.addlTxt:
9:20 AM Defendant Sheila M Thompson in court, in custody from the Vilas County Jail without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Victim rights complied with. No victim appearing.  Court/Defendant speak to the PD Office trying to obtain counsel. Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
SPD Status of Counsel Reports - 2,361 contacts

10:17 AM Defendant Sheila M Thompson in court, in custody with the Vilas County Jail without counsel.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. Court notes still waiting for PD appointment.  Defendant speaks to bond modification request. State objects to the bond modification. Court notes victims need to be notified. Court denies motion for bond modification. Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 1,081 contacts

10:11 AM Defendant Sheila M Thompson in court, in custody, without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. PD is still seeking counsel for defendant.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 587 Contacts

Defendant appears in court, in custody, without counsel.  DA  Karl Hayes appears in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Katrina Heller of ICW appears via zoom audio.  The public defender's office has made 106 contacts seeking counsel for defendant.  Court continues bond.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 106 contacts

1:40 PM Defendant Sheila M Thompson appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Shawl appears in person, specially. ADA Dennis Brown appears in court for State of Wisconsin. Katrina Heller of ICW appears by video.  Victim rights legislation has been complied with. Defendant did contact public defender's office and they will be appointing an attorney.  Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.
No contact with B.C.(2009), B.C.(2011), H.C.(2013) and R.P.(2020) unless authorized by ICW or Vilas County Social Services, No contact with co-defendant George Poupart.

3:37 PM Defendant Sheila M Thompson appeared by video, in custody, without counsel.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Katrina Heller of ICW present via video. Mother of defendant appears via zoom audio with the Courts permission.  D.T. appears via zoom audio.  Defendant confirms receipt of complaint.  Victim rights legislation has been complied with. Court reads charges. Defendant informed of attorney options. Defendant intends to contact the Public Defender's Office.  Court sets bond at $25,000.00 CASH with conditions: No contact with B.C.(2009), B.C.(2011), H.C.(2013) and R.P.(2020) unless authorized by ICW or Vilas County Social Services, No contact with co-defendant George Poupart.  Bond form. Court allows D.T. to make a statement.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 5, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Return on warrant on June 30, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
